embeds.title: About Exton Server Pass
embeds.description: Looking to boost your community's safety and efficiency? With the Server Pass, your Discord gets access to our full Twitter Checker system, tailored for teams and communities. Monitor unlimited Twitter accounts, receive real-time alerts, and allow specific roles to run checks directly. Whether you're managing a tight-knit alpha group or a growing project, our plans scale with your needs and keep your members protected.

embeds.title: Tiers
embeds.description:
⚠️ *Repeated checks don't count. For more details, see our [docs](https://exton-scam-tracker.gitbook.io/docs) to review our terms and services.*

⚠️ *Also Spots are limited to maintain optimal server performance and ensure dedicated support for all users*

fields.name: Pathfinder (~~$70.83~~ → $<price3months-pathfinder> for 3 months! 🎉 or $<pricePerMonth-pathfinder> per month)
fields.value:
✅ <checks-pathfinder> checks per day
✅ Allows specific roles to use the Twitter Checker within your Discord
✅ Tweet alerts from unlimited accounts (Twitter Monitor)
✅ Special role
✅ Special giveaways
❌ Real-time scam checker when a new member joins (coming soon)

⏳ Only <spotsLeft-pathfinder> spots left
